Valentino Rossi: Semoga Fabio Quartararo Bisa Juara Dunia
06 Nov 2019, 14:00 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Pebalap Monster Energy Yamaha, Valentino Rossi, mengaku tak akan kaget jika debutan Petronas Yamaha SRT, Fabio Quartararo, akan memperebutkan gelar dunia MotoGP dalam waktu dekat. Inilah salah satu alasan Rossi ingin melakukan perombakan dalam timnya mulai musim depan.
Musim ini, Quartararo tampil sangat garang. Meski belum juga menang, ia sudah konsisten bertarung di depan dan jadi ancaman terbesar bagi Marc Marquez di trek. Ia sudah mengantongi empat pole dan enam podium, yang dua di antaranya adalah finis kedua akibat disalip oleh Marquez pada lap penutup.
Seluruh penghuni garasi Yamaha pun mengakui bahwa performa Quartararo ini memotivasi mereka untuk lebih baik. Para teknisi dan insinyur bertekad meningkatkan performa YZR-M1, sementara pebalap Yamaha lainnya juga kian terlecut meraih hasil balap yang sama gemilangnya.

Valentino Rossi: Hopefully Fabio Quartararo Can World Champion
Nov 6 2019, 2:00 PM by Bola.net
Bola.net - Yamaha Energy Monster racer, Valentino Rossi, admitted he would not be surprised if the debutant of the Yamaha SRT Petronas, Fabio Quartararo, would fight over the MotoGP world title in the near future. This is one of the reasons Rossi wants to make an overhaul in his team starting next season.
This season, Quartararo appeared very fierce. Although he hasn't won yet, he has consistently fought ahead and is the biggest threat to Marc Marquez on the track. He has already bagged four poles and six podiums, two of which are second place finishes overtaken by Marquez on the closing lap.
All Yamaha garage residents also recognize that Quartararo's performance motivates them to be better. The technicians and engineers are determined to improve the performance of the YZR-M1, while other Yamaha riders are also getting excited about achieving the same glorious racing results.
